UmbracoDefinition.description: Configuration container for all Umbraco products.

ApiKey.description: Gets or sets the API key.
ApiKey.x-deprecatedMessage: Set the ApiSecret to a cryptographically random value of 64 bytes instead for improved security.

ApiSecret.description: Gets or sets the API secret.

EnableSignatureCacheReads.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether cached signatures are used.

ReloadMemoryCacheFollowingDiskReadOperat.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether to trigger a reload of the memory cache following
an extraction of schema from .uda files to update the Umbraco installation.

SuppressCacheRefresherNotifications.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether cache refresher notifications triggered following a deployment operation are suppressed.

AllowDomainsDeploymentOperations.description: Gets a value indicating the domains (or "Culture & Hostname" settings) to include in deployments.

AllowPublicAccessDeploymentOperations.description: Gets a value indicating the public access rules to include in deployments.

TrashedContentDeploymentOperations.description: Gets or sets a value indicating options for including trashed content in an export and processing during import.

ExcludedEntityTypes.description: Gets or sets the excluded entity types.

ValueConnectors.description: Gets or sets the property editor alias (key) to value connector type name (value) binding.

Edition.description: Gets or sets the Deploy edition.

AcceptInvalidCertificates.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to accept invalid certificates when connecting to remote environments.

PreferLocalDbConnectionString.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to prefer automatically initializing a LocalDB connection string (if not explicitly set and LocalDB is available).

SourceDeployBatchSize.description: Gets or sets a batch size for source deployments. A null value indicates no batching will take place.

PackageBatchSize.description: Gets or sets a batch size for package processing deployments. A null value indicates no batching will take place.

HideVersionDetails.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to hide the version details from the management dashboard.

HideConfigurationDetails.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to hide the configuration details from the management dashboard.

ResolveUserInTargetEnvironment.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether to resolve user's in the target environment for a deploy operation by email address.
If the email of a user in the target environment matches the email address of the user that initiated the transfer or restore
operation, their account will be associated with the content and media updates.

IgnoreBrokenDependenciesBehavior.description: Gets or sets a value indicating for which operations dependencies are ignored.

TransferDictionaryAsContent.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether dictionary items should be transferred as content via the back-office (or, if false, as schema via .uda files).

IgnoreMissingLanguagesForDictionaryItems.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether missing languages in dictionary items trigger a schema mismatch error.

SetEmptyDictionaryItemsOnTransfer.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether empty values will overwrite existing values when transferring dictionary items.

ContinueOnMediaFilePathTooLongException.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to continue or throw on media file path too long exceptions.

MediaFileChecksumCalculationMethod.description: Gets or sets a value indicating the method to use for calculating media file checksum values.

ExportMemberGroups.description:
Use this to disable export of member groups to disk.
Can be used to prevent issues when using externally stored member groups not managed by Umbraco.

TransferMemberGroupsAsContent.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether member group should be transferred as content via the back-office (or, if false, as schema via .uda files).

AllowMembersDeploymentOperations.description: Gets or sets a value indicating which operations are supported for members.

RelationTypes.description: Gets or sets a list of relation types with details on how they should be treated in Deploy operations.

NumberOfSignaturesToUseAllRelationCache.description: Gets or sets a value for the number of artifact signatures to process in a deploy operation before utilising a cache for the full set of relations.

Suspensions.description: Gets or sets the suspension options for each operation.

SessionTimeout.description: Gets or sets the session timeout.

SourceDeployTimeout.description: Gets or sets the source deploy timeout.

DatabaseCommandTimeout.description: Gets or sets the database command timeout.

HttpClientTimeout.description: Gets or sets the HTTP client timeout.

DiskOperationsTimeout.description: Gets or sets the disk operations timeout.

AllowWebhooksDeploymentOperations.description: Gets or sets a value indicating which operations are supported for webhooks.

DomainsDeploymentOperations.description: Specifies options for handling content "Culture & Hostnames" settings.

PublicAccessEntryDeploymentOperations.description: Specifies options for handling content "public access" settings.

TrashedContentDeploymentOperations.description: Specifies options for handling trashed content (documents, media and members).

IgnoreBrokenDependenciesBehavior.description: Specifies options for ignoring broken dependencies (instead of failing deployment when trashed or deleted dependencies are encountered).

MediaFileChecksumCalculationMethod.description: Specifies options for calculating checksums for media files.

MembersDeploymentOperations.description: Specifies options for deployment operations involving members.

DiskRead.description: Gets or sets the suspension options used during the disk read operation.

PartialRestore.description: Gets or sets the suspension options used during the partial restore operation.

Restore.description: Gets or sets the suspension options used during the restore operation.

Deploy.description: Gets or sets the suspension options used during the deploy operation.

Import.description: Gets or sets the suspension options used during the import operation.

Export.description: Gets or sets the suspension options used during the export operation.

SuspensionOptions.description: The suspension options used during an operation.

CurrentWorkspaceName.description: Gets or sets the name of the current workspace.

Workspaces.description: Gets or set the list of workspaces.
